import React from "react"; import classNames from "classnames"; import { SectionSplitProps } from "../../utils/SectionProps"; import SectionHeader from "./partials/SectionHeader"; import Image from "../elements/Image"; import image1 from "./../../assets/images/features-split-image-01.png"; import image2 from "./../../assets/images/features-split-image-02.png"; import image3 from "./../../assets/images/features-split-image-03.png"; const propTypes = { ...SectionSplitProps.types, }; const defaultProps = { ...SectionSplitProps.defaults, }; const FeaturesSplit = ({ className, topOuterDivider, bottomOuterDivider, topDivider, bottomDivider, hasBgColor, invertColor, invertMobile, invertDesktop, alignTop, imageFill, ...props }) => { const outerClasses = classNames( "features-split section", topOuterDivider && "has-top-divider", bottomOuterDivider && "has-bottom-divider", hasBgColor && "has-bg-color", invertColor && "invert-color", className ); const innerClasses = classNames( "features-split-inner section-inner", topDivider && "has-top-divider", bottomDivider && "has-bottom-divider" ); const splitClasses = classNames( "split-wrap", invertMobile && "invert-mobile", invertDesktop && "invert-desktop", alignTop && "align-top" ); const sectionHeader = { title: "What are Diadragons?", paragraph: "Diadragons are adorable dragons who dedicate their lives to keeping humans healthy and happy. Like a puppy, but less fluffy. They are one-of-a-kind NFTs that live on the Ethereum blockchain.", }; return (

Why should I adopt a Diadragon?

To join the first NFT community built to address the insulin affordability crisis.



In doing so, you’ll be eligible to win cool prizes, participate in our social media campaigns, and support our larger mission.



Our primary goal is to utilize web-3 technology to enable anyone to donate funds directly to people who pay for insulin and to verify that the money is spent on insulin.{" "}



Learn more about our mission ⅓ of their income for insulin and supplies today.



Due to privacy laws, large organizations have not been able to donate insulin directly to individuals in the past. With the inception of Web 3, we have found a way to protect personal information while verifying that the funds are being used for insulin by someone who needs it.



Updates and progress will be posted in our{" "} discord channel .

Why Now?

The web-3 space is full of new technology, innovators, and investors excited to be a part of applying the technology to unique solutions.



Now is a unique time when large organizations are willing to pick up the phone, hear our ideas, and test out our solutions.

Why this team?

Thanasi Dilos and the community at Civics Unplugged are a group of developers capable of building the secure platforms that will make direct donations for insulin a reality.



Meghan Sharkus, a Thiel Fellow, and 6-year entrepreneur in the diabetes space is ready to utilize her connections to integrate the solution into existing insulin purchasing channels. She has funded the development of this project completely out-of-pocket and is committed to making this vision a reality.



The team of artists, animators, developers, and marketers is willing to try, fail, and try again until the project is a success. We originally launched on Ethereum and when the platform became oversaturated and fees were over $150 per dragon, we rebuilt the project on Polygon and relaunched in a more affordable and accessible way.

Weekly Prize Drops

A portion of NFT sales will go towards YOU. We will be conducting giveaways every single week with a focus on health and life experience. Always wanted a personal trainer but never made the commitment? Your Diadragon will bring you one. Wanted to take a trip to Europe but haven’t prioritized it? Your Diadragon may have the whole thing already planned out for you.

); }; FeaturesSplit.propTypes = propTypes; FeaturesSplit.defaultProps = defaultProps; export default FeaturesSplit;
